Japanese:
オーキド『ほれ　そこに　３びき
ポケモンが　いる　じゃろう！
ほっほ！

こいつらを　きみたちに
いっぴき　づつ　やろう！
⋯⋯　さあ　えらべ！
English:
OAK: Look over
there! Do you see
those 3 #MON?
Hohoho!

You can each have
one! Choose!
Notes: Similar to RG. In fact, most of the text in this scene is either similar or identical to RG.

Take whichever one
you'd like!
